department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supplies all labour, materials and equipment
description: The work comprises of supplying all labour, materials, documentation, tools, equipment and other services required for the maintenance, repair, upgrade, replacement or installation of HVAC/R equipment as requested, restoring operation or meeting owner functional requirement at CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC for the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
# W684Q-230195 - HVAC Systems Maintenance Services Standing Offer

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W684Q-230195
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** February 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 23, 2023, at 14:00 (Local Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None (open-ended contract)
* **Tender Category:** Goods and Services - Standing Offer Contract
* **Procurement Method:** Open bidding (Competitive Tendering)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Services Required

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites bids for the provision of HVAC Systems Maintenance Services Standing Offer. The successful bidder will provide all necessary labour, materials, documentation, tools, equipment, and other services required for the maintenance, repair, upgrade, replacement, or installation of HVAC/R equipment at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, Victoria, British Columbia.

## Eligibility and Certification

The bidder must have a valid Master Tradesperson certification in a relevant trade (e.g., electrical, mechanical) and a maximum of 5 personnel with specialized HVAC maintenance experience.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to participants from the following countries:

* Canada
* Colombia (under Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement)
* Mexico (under Canada-Mexico Free Trade Agreement)
* Peru (under Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement)
* Other countries with which Canada has a trade reciprocity agreement

## Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:

Janie Leung (she/her)
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
Email: [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None

## Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the call for bids and the contract, can be found on the [discovery.ariba.com](http://discovery.ariba.com) website by searching for solicitation number W684Q-230195

Note: I changed the number from none or non to 'None' or 'N/A' (not applicable) as per industry
